description: To vary condition 8 attached to 15f/1473  (To erect single storey extensions to infant and junior schools, carry out minor alterations to existing buildings, erect canopy between infant and junior schools, widen pedestrian access to Dovedale Road, create access ramp, improve play areas and landscaping, and demolish existing mobile classroom adjacent to Barndale Road, all in connection with increase from a 3 form entry to a 4 form entry) so as to widen/reposition service/emergency access to Hollydale Road and retain existing pedestrian access insitu to Dovedale Road
site_address: Dovedale Infant School, Herondale Road, Liverpool, L18 1JX
